_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_INP_textField
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_FM_updateEvaluation
_a-0000eced-1a08-8000-9dce-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!refData: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getRefDataByTypes(
    refTypes: {
      cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_EVALUATION_METHOD,
      cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_IDV_AWARD_TYPE,
      cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_AWARD_INSTRUMENT_TYPE
    }
  ),
  local!fieldProperties: rule!AS_GSS_dynamicFieldPropertiesCreateEvaluation(
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    bundle: local!bundle,
    evaluationMethods: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
      records: local!refData,
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Data_SYNCEDRECORD.refType,
      values: cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_EVALUATION_METHOD
    ),
    idvAwardType: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
      records: local!refData,
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Data_SYNCEDRECORD.refType,
      values: cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_IDV_AWARD_TYPE
    ),
    instrumentTypes: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterRecordByFieldValues(
      records: local!refData,
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_R_Data_SYNCEDRECORD.refType,
      values: cons!AS_GSS_REF_TYPE_AWARD_INSTRUMENT_TYPE
    )
  ),
  local!solicitationDetails: a!match(
    value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId],
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GCW,
    then: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!solicitationDetails,
      replacementValue: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_GCW_GETDATA_getLatestOrBaseSolicitationDetails(
        evaluationId: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
        isBaseSolic: false()
      )
    ),
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_AM,
    then: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!solicitationDetails,
      replacementValue: rule!AS_GSS_APPREF_AM_GETDATA_getSolicitationDataForDraftingEvaluation(
        solicitationNumber: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],

      )
    ),
    default: {}
  ),
  local!originalEvaluationMethodId: a!refreshVariable(
    value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId],
    refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false()
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"(
    label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      bundleKey: "lbl_UpdateWithArgument",
      arguments: proper(ri!context)
    ),
    instructions: a!match(
      value: ri!context,
      whenTrue: or(
        fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_NAME,
        fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_DETAILS
      ),
      then: "Required fields are marked with an asterisk (*)",
      default: {}
    ),
    contents: a!match(
      value: ri!context,
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_NAME,
      then: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_updateEvaluationNameAndTitle(
        fieldProperties: local!fieldProperties,
        bundle: local!bundle,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        isDisabled: false()
      ),
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_DESCRIPTION,
      then: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_updateEvaluationDescription(
        fieldProperties: local!fieldProperties,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        isDisabled: false()
      ),
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_PERSONNEL,
      then: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_updateEvaluationPersonnel(
        fieldProperties: local!fieldProperties,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        isDisabled: false()
      ),
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_DETAILS,
      then: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_updateEvaluationDetails(
        fieldProperties: local!fieldProperties,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        solicitationDetails: local!solicitationDetails,
        isDisabled: false(),
        bundle: local!bundle,
        evaluators: ri!evaluators,
        originalEvaluationMethodId: local!originalEvaluationMethodId
      ),
      equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_SETTINGS,
      then: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_updateEvaluationSetting(
        fieldProperties: local!fieldProperties,
        evaluation: ri!evaluation,
        solicitationDetails: local!solicitationDetails,
        isDisabled: false(),
        bundle: local!bundle
      ),
      default: {}
    ),
    skipAutoFocus: true,
    buttons: rule!AS_GSS_BTN_updateEvaluationButtonLayout(
      bundle: local!bundle,
      userAction: ri!userAction,
      evaluation: ri!evaluation,
      context: ri!context,
      originalEvaluationMethodId: local!originalEvaluationMethodId
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

      ),

        )
      ),
      evaluationChief: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
        type: 'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Dictionary',

          )
        )
      ),
      contractingSpecialist: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(

        )
      ),

  )
)

_a-0000ecda-a664-8000-9dc8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(value: ri!fieldIdentifier),
  {},
  a!match(
    value: ri!fieldIdentifier,
    equals: "evaluationDates",
    then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
      items: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: rule!AS_CO_INP_dateField(
            label: ri!fieldProperties.startDate.label,
            readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.startDate.readOnly,
            value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStartDate],
            saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStartDate],
            required: ri!fieldProperties.startDate.required,
            disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
          item: rule!AS_CO_INP_dateField(
            label: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.label,
            readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.readOnly,
            value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDueDate],
            validations: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.validations,
            saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDueDate],
            required: ri!fieldProperties.dueDate.required,
            disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
          ),
          width: "MINIMIZE"
        )
      }
    ),
    equals: "evaluationMethod",
    then: rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.label,
      readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.readOnly,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.choiceValues,
      value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId],
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationMethodId],
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.evaluationMethod.helpTooltip,
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
    ),
    equals: "idvAwardType",
    then: rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.idvAwardType.label,
      readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.idvAwardType.readOnly,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.idvAwardType.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.idvAwardType.choiceValues,
      value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.idvAwardTypeId],
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.idvAwardTypeId],
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.idvAwardType.helpTooltip,
      disabled: or(
        a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false),
        ri!fieldProperties.idvAwardType.disabled
      ),
      showWhen: ri!isIdvInstrumentType
    ),
    equals: "instrumentType",
    then: rule!AS_GSS_CO_CP_dropdownField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.instrumentType.label,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.instrumentType.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.instrumentType.choiceValues,
      placeholderLabel: ri!fieldProperties.instrumentType.placeholder,
      required: ri!fieldProperties.instrumentType.required,
      value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.instrumentTypeId],
      saveInto: {
        ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.instrumentTypeId],
        a!save(
          ri!isIdvInstrumentType,
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(
            input: rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
              values: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.instrumentTypeId],
              array: rule!AS_GSS_UT_idvInstrumentTypes()
            )
          )
        ),
        if(
          ri!isIdvInstrumentType,
          {},
          a!save(
            ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.idvAwardTypeId],
            cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_IDV_AWARD_TYPE_SINGLE
          )
        )
      },
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      disabled: or(
        a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false),
        ri!fieldProperties.instrumentType.disabled
      )
    ),
    equals: "weightedFactors",
    then: rule!AS_GSS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.label,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.choiceValues,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
        default: true
      ),
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isWeightedFactorsRequired],
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.weightedFactors.helpTooltip,
      choiceStyle: "STANDARD",
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
    ),
    equals: "consensusReportSignature",
    then: rule!AS_GSS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.label,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.choiceValues,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired],
        default: true
      ),
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isSignaturesRequired],
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.helpTooltip,
      showWhen: ri!fieldProperties.consensusReportSignature.showWhen,
      choiceStyle: "STANDARD",
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false)
    ),
    equals: "onSpotConsensus",
    then: rule!AS_CO_CP_radioButtonField(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.label,
      readOnly: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.readOnly,
      choiceLabels: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.choiceLabels,
      choiceValues: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.choiceValues,
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus],
        default: false()
      ),
      saveInto: ri!evaluation[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isOnSpotConsensus],
      labelPosition: "ABOVE",
      choiceLayout: "STACKED",
      disabled: a!defaultValue(ri!isDisabled, false),
      helpTooltip: ri!fieldProperties.onSpotConsensus.helpTooltip
    ),
    equals: "popDates",
    then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      label: ri!fieldProperties.popDates.label,
      value: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(
            date: ri!solicitationDetails.popStartDate
          ),
          showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
            value: ri!solicitationDetails.popEndDate
          )
        ),
        " - ",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: rule!AS_CO_UT_formatDate(date: ri!solicitationDetails.popEndDate),
          showWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
            value: ri!solicitationDetails.popStartDate
          )
        )
      },
      showWhen: ri!fieldProperties.popDates.showWhen
    ),
    default: {}
  )
)

      readOnly: false
    ),

    placeholder: ri!placeholder,

      label: ri!label,

    ),

          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }

)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

            a!map(field: "disabled", value: local!disabled)
          }
        )
      )
    )
  )
